    1. Inputs(GraphOperation)

Class UniformQuantizedAdd.Inputs<T extends TNumber>

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.RawOpInputs<UniformQuantizedAdd<T>>
org.tensorflow.op.math.UniformQuantizedAdd.Inputs<T>
Enclosing class:
UniformQuantizedAdd<T extends TNumber>
public static class UniformQuantizedAdd.Inputs<T extends TNumber> extends RawOpInputs<UniformQuantizedAdd<T>>

  • Field Details

    • lhs

      public final Operand<T extends TNumber> lhs
      Must be a quantized tensor.

    • rhs

      public final Operand<T extends TNumber> rhs
      Must be a quantized tensor.

    • lhsScales

      public final Operand<TFloat32> lhsScales
      The float value(s) used as scale factors when quantizing the original data that lhs represents.

    • lhsZeroPoints

      public final Operand<TInt32> lhsZeroPoints
      The int32 value(s) used as zero points when quantizing original data that lhs represents. Must have same shape with lhs_scales.

    • rhsScales

      public final Operand<TFloat32> rhsScales
      The float value(s) used as scale factors when quantizing the original data that rhs represents.

    • rhsZeroPoints

      public final Operand<TInt32> rhsZeroPoints
      The int32 value(s) used as zero points when quantizing original data that rhs represents. Must have same shape with rhs_scales.

    • outputScales

      public final Operand<TFloat32> outputScales
      The float value(s) to use as scale factors when quantizing original data that output represents.

    • outputZeroPoints

      public final Operand<TInt32> outputZeroPoints
      The int32 value(s) used as zero points when quantizing original data that output represents. Must have same shape with output_scales.

    • lhsQuantizationAxis

      public final long lhsQuantizationAxis
      Indicates the dimension index of the tensor where per-axis quantization is applied for the slices along that dimension. If set to -1 (default), this indicates per-tensor quantization. For the lhs, only per-tensor quantization is supported. Thus, this must be set to -1. Other values will raise error at OpKernel construction.

    • lhsQuantizationMinVal

      public final long lhsQuantizationMinVal
      The min value of the quantized data stored in lhs. For example, if Tin is qint8, this must be set to -127 if narrow range quantized or -128 if not.

    • lhsQuantizationMaxVal

      public final long lhsQuantizationMaxVal
      The max value of the quantized data stored in lhs. For example, if Tin is qint8, this must be set to 127.

    • rhsQuantizationAxis

      public final long rhsQuantizationAxis
      Indicates the dimension index of the tensor where per-axis quantization is applied for the slices along that dimension. If set to -1 (default), this indicates per-tensor quantization. For the rhs, only per-tensor quantization or per-channel quantization along kernel_output_feature_dimension is supported. Thus, this must be set to -1 or dimension_numbers.kernel_output_feature_dimension. Other values will raise error at OpKernel construction.

    • rhsQuantizationMinVal

      public final long rhsQuantizationMinVal
      The min value of the quantized data stored in rhs. For example, if Tin is qint8, this must be set to -127 if narrow range quantized or -128 if not.

    • rhsQuantizationMaxVal

      public final long rhsQuantizationMaxVal
      The max value of the quantized data stored in rhs. For example, if Tin is qint8, this must be set to 127.

    • outputQuantizationAxis

      public final long outputQuantizationAxis
      Indicates the dimension index of the tensor where per-axis quantization is applied for the slices along that dimension. If set to -1 (default), this indicates per-tensor quantization. For the output, only per-tensor quantization or per-channel quantization along output_feature_dimension is supported. Thus, this must be set to -1 or dimension_numbers.output_feature_dimension. Other values will raise error at OpKernel construction.

    • outputQuantizationMinVal

      public final long outputQuantizationMinVal
      The min value of the quantized data stored in output. For example, if Tout is qint8, this must be set to -127 if narrow range quantized or -128 if not.

    • outputQuantizationMaxVal

      public final long outputQuantizationMaxVal
      The max value of the quantized data stored in output. For example, if Tout is qint8, this must be set to 127.

    • T

      public final DataType T
      The type of lhs, rhs, and output.
